name: Omadi's Labyrinth
description:
[Bug alert] Current submission has several bugs which have been fixed as of today. The game will be updated as soon as the game jam is over!

- Zombie offset fixed

- Pages #2 and #3 are getting picked up by zombies, fixed

- Sound being played everywhere, fixed

- Pages can now be used from the inventory

Keep in mind that these bugs exist in this version.

-------------------------------------------------------------

Omadi's Labyrinth is a grid-based horror dungeon crawler where you enter Omadi's lair to seek what happened to the missing wizard. Who knows what's gonna happen in there!

Controls:
1.Firebolt

2.Heal

WASD-Move

QE-Rotate camera

Space: Pickup items (like key items, flasks, etc)

Click on the Spellbook tabs to switch between pages. Some elements can be clicked, such as items, spells and action buttons.

Check the settings for multiple retro display modes!

All assets contained are either published assets available for free.
Player and monster models were obtained from Mixamo
Various models and textures were obtained from the Unity Store
